sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app id="inspire">
        <v-navigation-drawer
            v-model="drawer"
            app
            color="green lighten-4"
        >
            <v-container>
                <v-list-item>
                    <v-list-item-avatar>
                    <v-icon size="36">mdi-account-circle</v-icon>
                    </v-list-item-avatar>

                    <v-list-item-content>
                    <v-list-item-title>teste</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                </v-list-item>

                <v-divider></v-divider>

                <v-list dense>
                    <v-list-item
                    v-for="item in menus"
                    :key="item.title"
                    link
                    @click="AcessarLink(item)"
                    >
                        <v-list-item-icon>
                            <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
                        </v-list-item-icon>

                        <v-list-item-content>
                            <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                        </v-list-item-content>
                    </v-list-item>
                </v-list>
            </v-container>
        </v-navigation-drawer>

        <v-app-bar app color="green lighten-4">
        <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

        <v-toolbar-title>My Reserva</v-toolbar-title>
        </v-app-bar>

        <v-main>
            <empresas-component v-if="empresaComponent == true" @dadosEmpresa="RetornoEmpresa"></empresas-component>
            <agendar-component v-if="agendaComponent == true" :dadosEmpresa="dadosEmpresa" :dadosUsuario="this.$route.params.dadosUsuario" />
            <historico-cliente-component v-if="historicoClienteComponent == true"/>
            <configuracoes-empresa-component v-if="configuracoesEmpresaComponent == true"/>
            
            <inicial-empresa-component :dadosUsuario="this.$route.params.dadosUsuario"  v-if="inicialEmpresaComponent == false"/>
            <listar-usuarios-component v-if="cadastroUsuarioComponent == true"/>
        </v-main>

        <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script>

import GenericMethods from '@/mixins/GenericMethods'
import AgendarComponent from './AgendarComponent.vue'
import ConfiguracoesEmpresaComponent from './ConfiguracoesEmpresaComponent.vue'
import EmpresasComponent from './EmpresasComponent.vue'
import HistoricoClienteComponent from './HistoricoClienteComponent.vue'
import LoadComponent from './LoadComponent.vue'
import InicialEmpresaComponent from './TelaInicial/InicialEmpresaComponent.vue'
import CardPadraoComponent from './Field/CardPadraoComponent.vue'
import ListarUsuariosComponent from './Usuario/ListarUsuariosComponent.vue'

export default {
    components: { 
        EmpresasComponent, 
        AgendarComponent, 
        HistoricoClienteComponent, 
        ConfiguracoesEmpresaComponent, 
        InicialEmpresaComponent,
        LoadComponent,
        CardPadraoComponent,
        ListarUsuariosComponent 
    },

    name: "InicialComponent",
    mixins: [GenericMethods],
    data: () => ({
        dadosEmpresa: null,
        empresaComponent: true,
        agendaComponent: false,
        historicoClienteComponent: false,
        configuracoesEmpresaComponent: false,
        inicialEmpresaComponent: false,
        cadastroUsuarioComponent: false,
        salvarUsuario: false,
        drawer: null,
        menus: [
        { Id: 1, title: 'Home', icon: 'mdi-view-dashboard' },
        { Id: 2, title: 'Histórico', icon: 'mdi-forum' },
        { Id: 3, title: 'Empresa', icon: 'mdi-forum' },
        { Id: 4, title: 'Usuario', icon: 'mdi-forum' },
        { Id: 5, title: 'Sair', icon: 'mdi-forum' },
        ],
    }),
    methods: {
        DesabilitarComponentes() {
            this.empresaComponent = false,
            this.historicoClienteComponent = false,
            this.agendaComponent = false,
            this.configuracoesEmpresaComponent = false
            this.cadastroUsuarioComponent = false
        },
        AcessarLink(item){
            this.DesabilitarComponentes()
            
            if (item.Id == 1)
                this.empresaComponent = true
            else if (item.Id == 2)
                this.historicoClienteComponent = true
            else if (item.Id == 3)
                this.configuracoesEmpresaComponent = true
            else if (item.Id == 4)
                this.cadastroUsuarioComponent = true
            else if (item.Id == 5) {
                
                this.loader = !this.loader;

                setTimeout(() => {
                    localStorage.setItem('token', '')
                    this.$router.push('/')
                    
                    this.loader = !this.loader;
                }, 900)
            }

          
        },
        RetornoEmpresa(empresa) {
            debugger
            this.DesabilitarComponentes()
            this.dadosEmpresa = empresa
            this.agendaComponent = true
        },

        SalvarUsuario() {
            this.salvarUsuario = !this.salvarUsuario
        },
    },
}
</script>
<style scoped>
    .v-main {
        padding: 15px 15px !important;
    }
</style>
